messages.subject: The Trip
messages.messageBody:
<<Susan,
How's the trip going? Is she having a great time?

Lisa>>


< My 20-year-old dd, home/unschooled since the "6th grade", is getting ready to take off on a travel adventure.>

She's not leaving until Wednesday morning. Gulp. She decided to take a bus all the way across country to save some money, then she'll start the Amtrak portion of the trip after staying with a friend in Eugene, OR, for a couple weeks.

She got her hostel card today and bought a neat little bag to keep things in. Also dyed her hair red (really a dark auburn). She's alternately excited and kinda irritable--a little nervous, I suspect, but still gung ho.

Btw, I remembered who used to send out The Barrage--it was Inknote! I wonder if she's still around....

Susan
